languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Технобрат Тарзус Ханейманн принимает святые //муки//износ//, однако они //не сказываются//не критически сказываются// на его когнитивной способности к анализу данных. Единица, именующая себя Паскалем Ханейманном, у нас есть информация, компрометирующая тебя. Благодаря сведениям, что ты //состоишь в свите//выполняешь обслуживание// Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус, мы направились сюда для осуществления //встречи//перехвата//боестолкновения//".

"The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Технобрат Тарзус Ханейманн принимает святые //муки//износ//, однако они //не сказываются//не критически сказываются// на его когнитивной способности к анализу данных. Единица, именующая себя Паскалем Ханейманном, у нас есть информация, компрометирующая тебя. Благодаря сведениям, что ты //состоишь в свите//выполняешь обслуживание// Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус, мы направились сюда для осуществления //встречи//перехвата//боестолкновения//".

Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have headed here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

"The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

languages.text: 「この声明は誤りである。技術同胞ターザス・ヘニュマンは進んで聖なる//苦痛//劣化//を耐える意志があるが、それはしかし彼のデータ解析の認知能力は//影響を及ぼさない//致命的な影響を及ぼさない//。ユニットは自身をパスカル・ヘニュマンと称し、我々はあなたが関与しているとする情報を持っている。あなたが自由開拓者のフォン・ヴァランシウスの//領地の一員//整備の専門家//であると知り、我々は//あなたに会う//あなたを封じる//あなたを戦闘に従事させる//目的でここへやってきた」
languages.original_text: "The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

traits.locale_text: 「この声明は誤りである。技術同胞ターザス・ヘニュマンは進んで聖なる//苦痛//劣化//を耐える意志があるが、それはしかし彼のデータ解析の認知能力は//影響を及ぼさない//致命的な影響を及ぼさない//。ユニットは自身をパスカル・ヘニュマンと称し、我々はあなたが関与しているとする情報を持っている。あなたが自由開拓者のフォン・ヴァランシウスの//領地の一員//整備の専門家//であると知り、我々は//あなたに会う//あなたを封じる//あなたを戦闘に従事させる//目的でここへやってきた」

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。技术兄弟塔祖斯·哈努曼自愿接受了神圣的//折磨//恶化//，但这并//不影响//不严重影响//他对数据分析的认知能力。告知自称帕斯卡·哈努曼的单位，我们已经掌握了你的信息。我们已经得知，你是冯·瓦兰修斯家族行商浪人的//随行人员//维修专家//，我们来这里的目的是//和你见面//将你拦截//与你交战//。”
languages.original_text: "The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。技术兄弟塔祖斯·哈努曼自愿接受了神圣的//折磨//恶化//，但这并//不影响//不严重影响//他对数据分析的认知能力。告知自称帕斯卡·哈努曼的单位，我们已经掌握了你的信息。我们已经得知，你是冯·瓦兰修斯家族行商浪人的//随行人员//维修专家//，我们来这里的目的是//和你见面//将你拦截//与你交战//。”

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch. Tech-Bruder Tarzus Haneumann unterzieht sich willentlich heiliger //Folter//Deterioration//, was aber seine kognitive Kapazität zur Datenanalyse nicht //beeinträchtigt//entscheidend beeinträchtigt//. Einheit, die sich selbst Pasqal Haneumann nennt, wir haben Informationen, die Euch belasten. Als wir erfuhren, dass Ihr //ein Mitglied des Gefolges//ein Wartungsspezialist in Diensten// {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius seid, reisten wir hierher, um Euch //zu treffen//abzufangen//im Kampf zu besiegen//."
languages.original_text: "The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist falsch. Tech-Bruder Tarzus Haneumann unterzieht sich willentlich heiliger //Folter//Deterioration//, was aber seine kognitive Kapazität zur Datenanalyse nicht //beeinträchtigt//entscheidend beeinträchtigt//. Einheit, die sich selbst Pasqal Haneumann nennt, wir haben Informationen, die Euch belasten. Als wir erfuhren, dass Ihr //ein Mitglied des Gefolges//ein Wartungsspezialist in Diensten// {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}von Valancius seid, reisten wir hierher, um Euch //zu treffen//abzufangen//im Kampf zu besiegen//."

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Le technofrère Tarzus Haneumann se soumet de son plein gré à la //torture//détérioration// sacrée, mais cela //n'affecte pas//n'affecte pas de manière critique// sa capacité cognitive à analyser les données. Unité qui vous faites appeler Pasqal Haneumann, nous avons des preuves incriminantes contre vous. Quand nous avons appris que vous étiez //un membre de l'entourage//un expert à la maintenance au service// {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius, nous sommes venus ici dans le but de //vous rencontrer//vous intercepter//vous affronter//. »
languages.original_text: "The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Le technofrère Tarzus Haneumann se soumet de son plein gré à la //torture//détérioration// sacrée, mais cela //n'affecte pas//n'affecte pas de manière critique// sa capacité cognitive à analyser les données. Unité qui vous faites appeler Pasqal Haneumann, nous avons des preuves incriminantes contre vous. Quand nous avons appris que vous étiez //un membre de l'entourage//un expert à la maintenance au service// {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} von Valancius, nous sommes venus ici dans le but de //vous rencontrer//vous intercepter//vous affronter//. »

languages.text: «Esa afirmación es falsa. El tecnohermano Tarzus Haneumann se somete de manera voluntaria a un sagrado //tormento//menoscabo//, que sin embargo //no afecta//no afecta críticamente// su capacidad cognitiva para el análisis de datos. Unidad que responde al nombre de Pasqal Haneumann, disponemos de información que le involucra. Habiendo descubierto que es usted //miembro del séquito//un especialista de mantenimiento al servicio// {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, hemos acudido con el propósito de //encontrarle//interceptarle//atacarle//».
languages.original_text: "The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

traits.locale_text: «Esa afirmación es falsa. El tecnohermano Tarzus Haneumann se somete de manera voluntaria a un sagrado //tormento//menoscabo//, que sin embargo //no afecta//no afecta críticamente// su capacidad cognitiva para el análisis de datos. Unidad que responde al nombre de Pasqal Haneumann, disponemos de información que le involucra. Habiendo descubierto que es usted //miembro del séquito//un especialista de mantenimiento al servicio// {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, hemos acudido con el propósito de //encontrarle//interceptarle//atacarle//».

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Tekno Kardeş Tarzus Haneumann, kendi iradesiyle kutsal //eziyetten//bozulmadan// geçmekte ancak bu durum onun veri analizi için gereken bilişsel kapasitesini //etkilememekte//kritik ölçekte etkilememekte//. Kendisinin Pasqal Haneumann olduğunu söyleyen birim, elimizde seni işaret eden bilgiler mevcut. Senin Hür Tacir von Valancius'un //maiyetinden//hizmetindeki bir bakım uzmanı// olduğunu öğrenmemizin ardından buraya //seninle görüşmek//seni engellemek//seninle çatışmaya girmek// amacıyla geldik."
languages.original_text: "The statement is false. Tech-Brother Tarzus Haneumann is willingly undergoing holy //torment//deterioration//, which however //does not affect//does not critically affect// his cognitive capacity for data analysis. Unit calling itself Pasqal Haneumann, we have information that implicates you. Having learned that you are //a member of the retinue//a maintenance specialist in the service// of Rogue Trader von Valancius, we have come here with the goal of //meeting you//intercepting you//engaging you in combat//."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Tekno Kardeş Tarzus Haneumann kendi iradesiyle kutsal //eziyetten//bozulmadan// geçmekte ancak bu, onun veri analizi için gereken bilişsel kapasitesini //etkilememekte//kritik ölçekte etkilememekte//. Kendisinin Pasqal Haneumann olduğunu söyleyen birim, elimizde seni işaret eden bilgiler mevcut. Senin Hür Tacir von Valancius'un //maiyetindekilerden biri//hizmetindeki bir bakım uzmanı// olduğunu öğrenmemizin ardından buraya //seninle görüşmek//seni engellemek//seninle çatışmaya girmek// amacıyla geldik."
